entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Trois-Pistoles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
